mobs.LongDesc: Ragnarok, the Father of all Frost Giants, is plotting revenge.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ragnarok was the former supreme leader of the Frost Giants until his
treacherous sons lead by Lord Dragomir tricked him into entering this
enchanted prison cell.  Together with his Empress, Lady Dementia, they
have been trapped here for over a century and there seemed to be no
way they can escape. 
Ragnarok stands taller than any normal Frost Giant and his physique
for a 1,500 year-old giant is truly exceptional.  He carries an ancient
blade that was once held by Odin, and with this sword Ragnarok is 
next to impossible to defeat!

mobs.LongDesc: Dementia, the Mother of all Frost Giants, stands faithfully next to her man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dementia is the fairest of the Frost Giants and that's why Ragnarok made
her his queen.  She's also the mother of the Seven Sons of the Frost
Giants, the same sons who locked her and their father inside this dark
prison cell.  Dementia is a mistress of magic and her powers have no 
limits.  Only Ragnarok and her first born son, Dragomir, could match her
in the mystic arts.

mobs.LongDesc: Lord Dragomir, the almighty King of the Frost Giants, stands before you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lord Dragomir is the current leader and King of the Frost Giants.  He's
the eldest son of Ragnarok, Father of all Frost Giants.  Dragomir stands
taller than all his other brothers.  With armor covering his entire body
and a thick pounding sword, this giant looks ready to do battle with the
unknown forces from outside his kingdom.

mobs.LongDesc: A tired-looking viking warrior stands here, ready to die...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
King Salamone was once the most powerful king that had ever ruled this
land.  But his conquest came to an end when he crossed paths with 
Ragnarok and his army of Frost Giants.  Overwhelmed and outnumbered, 
Salamone had to surrender his army to the monsters.  After that, he
wandered aimlessly through the cold regions in disgrace for his defeat.

mobs.LongDesc: A red-bearded viking warrior is sleeping here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Erik the Red is possibly the greatest viking warrior of all time.  His
thirst for blood and victory is unmatched.  His reign, however, came to
an abrupt end when he tried conquering the Land of the Frost Giants.
He and his viking soldiers almost succeeded, but a spell cast by 
Dementia, Queen of the Frost Giants, ended Erik's plans.  The spell 
forced Erik to sleep forever, never to be awaken unless he's endangered.
His body was placed inside this great mountain so that no one may ever
find this warrior and awaken him.

mobs.LongDesc: A gargoyle statue is staring at you...and drooling!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This gargoyle-like creature has lived for centuries trying to find a way
to escape this terrible island.  With some incredible powers, this 
creature could do a lot of damage if he is ever allowed to walk on the
mainland.  This creature's name is the 'Basilisk' and if you ever mention
his name to the residents in the mainland, you could see the terror in
their eyes.

mobs.LongDesc: Nemesis the evil alchemist is here, stirring up a batch of blood and goo.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nemesis is the sorceror supreme in this god-forsaken land.  His magic
combined with his knowledge of science are a danger to everyone that
he plan to destroy.  No one can stop him when he is determined to do
anything and not even you, with you powerful weapon and armor, could
defeat this evil sorcerer.

mobs.LongDesc: Tseefer the Spider-God is looking to make a meal out of you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This giant vicious black widow spider that stands here guarding this 
enchanted prison cell is Tseefer the Spider-God!  This creature has been
here since the day this cell was first constructed a thousand years ago.
Tseefer doesn't look like a pushover and there's no way you can pass
through this door without him attacking you!

mobs.LongDesc: A primitive caveman is here, looking to skin you alive.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gorg is the last primitive caveman in this world and he has endured many
elements of danger to have survive as long as he has.  With skin thicker
than a bull's hide and the strength of ten men, Gorg can do almost anything
he wants if he wanted to.

mobs.LongDesc: Titano the Demented stands here, torturing his helpless captives.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Titano is the seven brothers of the Frost Giants and the most bloodthirsty
one in the bunch.  He's a torturer and he enjoys his work.  He would watch
his victims die slowly as they lie on his stretcher of death.  Titano
looks smaller than his other brothers but don't under-estimate him for
his size.  This Frost Giant can fight as well as all his other brothers
and you can be sure, his opponents will suffer for their defeat.

mobs.LongDesc: Nuklo the Undefeated stands here, gesturing you to fight him.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nuklo is one of the seven brothers of the Frost Giants and the possibly
the best fighter among them.  He's an expert in all the martial-arts and
there's no other who can match him in speed and agility.  Nuklo is a
medium-sized giant with large powerful arms and legs.  He could move at
the speed of a smaller giant and have the strength of a larger giant.
He doesn't look like a pushover, so if you want to try to defeat him,
you'll be in a hell of a battle!

mobs.LongDesc: Lykos the Merciless is here, gutting a human carcass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lykos is one of the seven brothers of the Frost Giants and the food 
preparer in the Fortress.  He enjoys maiming and skinning the daily
kills and then cooking them in hot bubbly oil.  Lykos is as bloodthirsty
and sadistic as his other brother, Titano.  He loves watching his
helpless captives scream as he removes their skin slowly from their
pink flesh!

mobs.LongDesc: Kronos the Hated stands here, practicing a strange form of martial arts.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Kronos is one of the seven brothers of the Frost Giant and he's also the
weaponsmith for the army.  His knowledge of weapons is unsurpassed and his
collection of various instruments of destruction is just incredible.  
He supplies the army of Frost Giants with new and improved war gear and
weapons and there seems to be no limit to how advance his weapons get
everytime he makes the change.

mobs.LongDesc: Brachio the Dreadful stands here, sharpening his arrows for the next hunt!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Brachio is one of the seven brothers of the Frost Giants and the master
hunter in the clan.  There's no one who could hunt like Brachio can and
when this silent giant goes into a forest ground, you can be sure he
will be bringing home some fresh catch.

mobs.LongDesc: Zbysko the Devious is here, chanting a spell from an ancient scroll.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Zbysko is one of the seven brothers of the Frost Giant and he's the master
magician in this fortress.  He's the youngest and the most shrewd brother
of Dragomir.  Zbysko is smarter than all the Frost Giant.  Though he doesn't
have the strength and brutal instinct like his brothers, Zbysko's magic
is his key to victory over his opponents.

mobs.LongDesc: A beast from Hell is here, whipping his tentacles at all directions.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This beast of Hell has escaped from the fiery depths and is now unleashed
upon the helpless peasants of this land.  The locals call this monster
'Hellion' and indeed he is a monster born from Satan's womb.  This creature
stands as tall as the Frost Giants themselves and with sharp claws and horns
he looks very intimidating.

mobs.LongDesc: Phalius the Protector of the Land, looks out for evil conquerors and warlords.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Phalius is the legendary guardian of this frozen wasteland.  He has sat here
for hundreds of years, looking out for any possible dangers that could 
destroy his beloved homeland.  Phalius is a immortal warrior with the 
strength of ten men and the fighting skills that even the mighty Erik the
Red would envy.

mobs.LongDesc: Darkastian the Defender is standing here, guarding this entrance.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Darkastian the Defender is the giant guardian assigned to protect this
Fortress door.  No one is allowed inside this great construct unless you
happen to be one of the Frost Giants.  Darkastian stands taller than a
three story building and his powerful knuckles are the size of an 
automobile.  Armed with a powerful weapon and covered in thick armor, 
this giant is ready to guard this entrance from intruders such as yourself.

mobs.LongDesc: A savage barbarian is here, hunting for tonight's dinner.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This barbarian is dark and husky.  His physique is comparable to that of
a bodybuilding champion.  He stands a good 6'4" and he's clad in fur
cloak and some body armor on parts of his body.  This savage wields an
axe made of cold hard steel and he wears a primitive-looking shield on
his back.

mobs.LongDesc: A Frost Giant is coming towards you with a large bloody axe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This giant stands taller than an apartment building and he's built like
a tank.  His entire body is covered in thick steel armor that looks 
almost invincible.  It would be wise to give him what he wants...and 
that's including your life!

mobs.LongDesc: A white hare is jumping up and down, struggling to move on this bed of snow.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
There's nothing unordinary about this hare.  He's just one of the few
animals that inhabit this god-forsaken place.  This hare is covered in
a thick fur that protects him from the harsh temperatures.

mobs.LongDesc: A white-tailed deer is here, eating the leaves of a fallen tree.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This deer looks pretty healthy for an animal in the middle of nowhere.
He's enjoying a meal of leaves and pine needle and he looks to fatten
himself for the terrible weather that will come.  Though he may look
vulnerable at this moment, he's actually very alert of his surroundings.

mobs.LongDesc: An armor-clad viking mercenary is here, looking for any type of work.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This mercenary is simply clad with armor all over his body.  He knows 
that if he is to survive in this tremendous conditions, he must wear
warm clothes and strong gear to defend against hungry predators.  The
mercenary is wielding a broadsword which is stained with the blood
of innocent victims.

mobs.LongDesc: Stalking near some bushes...a sabretooth tiger is ready to attack!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Long thought to be extinct, this ferocious beast has survived and adapted
itself to frozen enviroment.  This sabretooth tiger is entirely covered
in white fur as though its purpose is to camoflage itself.  His powerful
claws can easily rip through armor and flesh.  He looks ready to hunt for
his next meal...and his target seems to be YOU!

mobs.LongDesc: A camoflaged snow leopard is here...ready to rip you to shreds!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This snow leopard is just as ferocious as its ancestor, the sabretooth
tiger.  Its powerful claws and its incredible speed has made this beast
the king of predators.  Only the sabretooth tiger can scare off this
great beast, but the tiger is not fast enough to catch him.

mobs.LongDesc: A grey-fleshed guardian stands here, staring at you with a devilish grin.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Torque looks like at statue when you come close to him but his staring
eyes tell you that he's alive and watching your ever movement.  This 
guardian has pale grey skin as though he's an undead.  He wields a powerful
weapon and covers himself in strong armor.  Torque looks determined to
guard this door from curious travelers like yourself.

mobs.LongDesc: A viking warrior is here, looking for a glorious battle to join.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This healthy and strong viking warrior is looking for a good battle to
join.  He would do anything to battle some strong opposition...even for
no pay at all.  The war is everything to this viking soldier and no one
can stop from his destiny to become the greatest warrior ever.

mobs.LongDesc: A monster fish with an apetite for young warriors is coming at you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
There is no fish in this world that could be compared to this creature.  They
call him the 'Devilfish' because of his brutal attacks on boats and rafts
that drift nearby his territory.  No man has ever escape from the jaws of
this super-beast.  As he comes near you, you notice he's even larger than
a blue whale!

mobs.LongDesc: A very large and very hungry rat is here, ready to tear into your pink flesh!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This rat has to be the size of a family-size Buick.  It has sharp, very
sharp claws and its incisors could cut into your armor like butter.  
Once he senses your presence in this room, you can bet that he wouldn't
hesitate to kill you and then feast on your flesh!

mobs.LongDesc: Standing before you is Bellos, the greatest protector of the Fortress.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Impressed with how Bellos defeated all his top soldiers, Lord Dragomir made
this Frost Giant the Prime Vindicator of the Fortress.  Bellos was blessed
with great strength and speed which gives him an edge over his fellow
compatriots.  He wields a powerful sword and he's covered in armor.  This
guardian looks ready to defend whatever evil lies ahead.
